1.0.name: wordpress/advanced-twitter-widget
1.0.description: Plugin Description:<br/> A widget that will enable visitors to add twitter account or return search results, with a custom number of maximum results per account/search. It's easy to use , flexible and has multiple displays by two(so far) types of content. More will be added in future versions..<br/> Update: 1.0.1 Small design issue<br/> Update: 1.0.2 I've got 1 report of a error for a code that i replaced recently with a better one. <br/><br/> DONATE! <br/>DONATE HERE - (any ammount using paypal or credit card) <br/>
